attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I don't believe that internet petitions have any bearings on government decisions and merely serve to reinforce the illusion that people can make a difference by sitting on their backsides and surfing the web between episodes of Eastenders and Corrie. If people really want to do something they should find out which of their local MPs have the same views as them and vote at the next election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
